Uses of Package
org.jgrapes.io.util

Packages that use org.jgrapes.io.util
Package Description
org.jgrapes.io
I/O related components built on top of the core package.
org.jgrapes.io.events
Provides the events used by the I/O related components.
org.jgrapes.io.util
Utility classes, mainly for adapted buffers to specific needs.
org.jgrapes.net
Networking related I/O classes.
  • Classes in org.jgrapes.io.util used by org.jgrapes.io
    Class Description
    ManagedBuffer
    A wrapper around a Buffer that maintains a lock count for that buffer.
    ManagedBufferPool
    A queue based buffer pool.
  • Classes in org.jgrapes.io.util used by org.jgrapes.io.events
    Class Description
    ManagedBuffer
    A wrapper around a Buffer that maintains a lock count for that buffer.
  • Classes in org.jgrapes.io.util used by org.jgrapes.io.util
    Class Description
    AvailabilityListener
    Used to notify interested objects about the changed availability of permits.
    BufferCollector
    Defines the method of a buffer collector.
    ByteBufferOutputStream
    An OutputStream that is backed by ByteBuffers obtained from a queue.
    CharBufferWriter
    An Writer that is backed by CharBuffers obtained from a queue.
    InputStreamPipeline
    Forwards the content of an input stream as a sequence of Output events.
    LinkedIOSubchannel
    Provides an I/O subchannel that is linked to another I/O subchannel.
    ManagedBuffer
    A wrapper around a Buffer that maintains a lock count for that buffer.
    ManagedBuffer.ByteBufferView
    A read-only view of the managed buffer’s content (backing buffer) and a reference to the managed buffer.
    ManagedBuffer.CharBufferView
    A read-only view of the managed buffer’s content (backing buffer) and a reference to the managed buffer.
    ManagedBufferPool
    A queue based buffer pool.
    ManagedBufferPool.ManagedBufferPoolMXBean.PoolInfo
    Information about a single managed pool.
    ManagedBufferPool.ManagedBufferPoolMXBean.PoolInfos
    Three views on the existing pool.
    PermitsPool
    A class that manages a set of permits and notifies listeners about changes of availability.
  • Classes in org.jgrapes.io.util used by org.jgrapes.net
    Class Description
    ManagedBuffer
    A wrapper around a Buffer that maintains a lock count for that buffer.
    ManagedBufferPool
    A queue based buffer pool.
    PermitsPool
    A class that manages a set of permits and notifies listeners about changes of availability.
